data: The thread 'Project Alpha Design Review' discusses scheduling a design review meeting for Project Alpha.
The thread 'Project Alpha Design Review' communicates the purpose of reviewing mockups and wireframes for Project Alpha.
The thread 'Project Alpha Design Review' shares that Carol requested team availability for a design review meeting next Wednesday.
The thread 'Project Alpha Design Review' indicates that Dave reviewed the project plan and budget documents and has questions about layout specifications.
The thread 'Project Alpha Design Review' identifies that the design review will involve discussion of mockups, wireframes, and budget considerations.
The thread 'Project Alpha Design Review' includes action items for Carol to finalize the meeting time and for Dave to prepare specification questions.
